Interface AdminDAOInterface

public interface AdminDAOInterface
Interface for Admin Data Access Object (DAO) operations

    • registerAdmin

      void registerAdmin(Admin admin)
      Registers a new admin in the system.
      Parameters:
      admin - The Admin object to be registered

    • authenticateAdmin

      boolean authenticateAdmin(String username, String password)
      Authenticates an admin based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin
      password - The password of the admin
      Returns:
      True if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • getAllUnapprovedCenters

      Retrieves all unapproved gym centers.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing information about unapproved gym centers

      Returns:
      ResultSet containing information about all gym centers

      Parameters:
      centerId - The ID of the gym center to be approved
